name: 블록과 미연시와 고대 그리스
description:
A chaotic and entertaining educational game set in ancient Greece!

Become the fictional philosopher Epistemonos and get some knowledge by defeating the scholars who stand in your way!

Drag letter blocks to merge them and defeat the enemies. Immerse yourself in a topsy-turvy story set in ancient Greece, with a focus on the Acropolis.

Developed as a graduation project by the "The Oath of the Peach Garden" team from Jeonju University's Game Contents Department, this game is designed to provide players with an easier approach to subjects like philosophy, which is weighty and serious atmosphere.

Merge the blocks and defeat your enemies!

As you drag and merge blocks with the same letter blocks, your character, Epistemonos, immediately attacks against the enemies. Help Epistemonos defeat all the enemies and regain the lost scrolls!

Exciting virtual dialogues with scholars!

Click on the "Compendium" menu on the starting screen to see brief information about the scholars you have defeated and their thoughts. Engage in fictional conversations with eight of these scholars.

Through repeated play, unlock the profiles of 17 scholars and make your study of philosophy more enjoyable!

Merge blocks and achieve the highest score!

In "Free Mode," you can merge blocks alone without any battles, accumulating scores with each merge. Strive to set a new high score and challenge yourself to surpass it!
